import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' // import axios from 'axios' import useFetch from 'hooks/useFetch' const Authentication = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false) const [{response, isLoading, error}, doFetch] = useFetch( 'https://conduit.productionready.io/api/users/login' ) console.log('fff', response, isLoading, error) const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() setIsSubmitting(true) console.log('values', email, password) } return (
